interface.name: GarbageCollectorMXBean
interface.javadoc:
Platform-specific management interface for a garbage collector which performs collections in cycles.

This platform extension is only available to the garbage collection implementation that supports this extension. Mandy Chung 1.5

Returns the GC information about the most recent GC. This method returns a {@link GcInfo}. If no GC information is available, null is returned. The collector-specific attributes, if any, can be obtained via the {@link CompositeData CompositeData} interface.

MBeanServer access: The mapped type of GcInfo is CompositeData with attributes specified in {@link GcInfo#from GcInfo}. a GcInfo object representing the most GC information; or null if no GC information available.
